comments.message: Hi Seemran, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. description:
We can make a really protective glass screen for ebola patience so the workers doesn't get infected while trying to treat the Ebola virus. 

The glass is very thin, protective and it coveres the whole patient's personal area. The health-care workes can work behind the glass. 

Although, this may be expensive and the supplies may be limited.
summary: A glass to cover the infected patients
title: Idea to protect the health-care workers
